    {    "key": "ctrl+alt+c",
        "command": "macros.latex_code_word"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+i",
        "command": "macros.italic_latex"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+alt+p",
        "command": "macros.markdown_code_block"
    },

    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+j",
        "command": "editor.action.joinLines"
    }

        "key": "ctrl+shift+s",
        "command": "macros.hmtl_sub"
    }
